name: CNN
text: "Your relationship is a political statement.” @wkamaubell talks with @donlemon about the realities of being in an interracial relationship in modern America. Listen to this week's #SilenceIsNotAnOption podcast: https://t.co/H1mu0vQ70R https://t.co/SHQAirrdr9

name: CNN
text: A Secret Service officer, who shot a Black man outside the White House earlier this month, mistook the black comb in the man's hands for a gun, according to an affidavit filed Wednesday https://t.co/gwCtESQLCa

name: CNN
text: Melania Trump's former confidant Stephanie Winston Wolkoff is dishing out a behind-the-scenes look at the allegedly contentious relationship between the first lady and first daughter Ivanka Trump https://t.co/U28BWqx8MN

name: CNN
text:
Jacob Blake, who remains hospitalized after sustaining multiple injuries, is now handcuffed to his bed, according to his family.

"This is an insult to injury," Blake's uncle says. "He is paralyzed and can't walk and they have him cuffed to the bed. Why?" https://t.co/CfDi2A3JDZ

name: CNN
text:
RT @CNNPolitics: The fourth and final night of the RNC has kicked off, with a theme focused around the “Land of Greatness.”

Among tonight's speakers:
• Donald Trump
• Ben Carson
• Mitch McConnell
• Ivanka Trump
•Tom Cotton
• Rudy Giuliani 

Follow for live updates https://t.co/d9wRRzINyx https://t.co/ePTke8EnYN

text: RT @TheLeadCNN: CNN’s @jaketapper on the lack of social distancing at #RNC2020: “It’s really alarming. … Since the Republican convention began on Monday until 5 p.m. today ... 3,688 Americans have died of coronavirus … We have had more losses due to this virus than were lost due to 9/11.” https://t.co/WZDcFbjHWHCNN’s @jaketapper on the lack of social distancing at #RNC2020: “It’s really alarming. … Since the Republican conve… https://t.co/XdAbzwQOOb

name: CNN
text: A state judge in Iowa's second-largest county has invalidated more than 50,000 applications for absentee ballots, prompting election officials to re-send applications to thousands of voters because of problems with the original forms https://t.co/s9J8d5xNip

name: CNN
text:
Ahead of a scheduled game between the NY Mets and Miami Marlins, the players left the field after observing a 42-second moment of silence. 

MLB is scheduled to observe Jackie Robinson Day on Friday. The color-barrier-breaking Hall of Famer wore number 42. https://t.co/Fx0bZhSvkY

name: CNN
text: How do you talk about racism if your partner is a different race than you? On this week’s #SilenceIsNotAnOption podcast, @donlemon talks with @wkamaubell about how they have tough conversations with those they love. https://t.co/H1mu0vQ70R https://t.co/9hmYuWk6YH

name: CNN
text: Eight players from the University of Nebraska football team are suing the Big Ten Conference, requesting an order to invalidate the Big Ten's decision to not play football this fall https://t.co/6UJe1XPQFe
